transcript.text: the modern era has brought new

technologies have evolved so two of the
ways that they're being censored in the
past if people didn't like an author
they would burn their books today we see

banning D boosting demonetised D
platforming and outright banning the
good news is we can stop it burning with

and pushing back on the big tech that is
